entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trois-Pistoles

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
